Features.title: API
Features.description: FusionCMS provides a powerful API that is ready for you to use. You can use the API to query your data, perform mutations, and more.

Features.title: Secured
Features.description: FusionCMS is secured by default. We have implemented a variety of security features to ensure your endpoints are safe from attacks.

Features.title: Multi-Database
Features.description: FusionCMS supports multiple database drivers. You can use MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, and more. You can even use multiple databases at once.

Features.title: Configurable
Features.description: FusionCMS is highly configurable. You can configure your application to your liking. If you need to change something, you can do so with ease using the config file.

Features.title: Scalable
Features.description: FusionCMS is built to scale. You can use FusionCMS to build small applications, or large applications. FusionCMS is built to handle it all.

Features.title: Tested
Features.description: FusionCMS is tested. We have a variety of tests that ensure FusionCMS is working as expected. We also have a variety of tests that ensure FusionCMS is secure.

Features.title: Extensible
Features.description: FusionCMS is built to be extensible. You can extend FusionCMS by using middleware, or by using the FusionCMS API. You can even create your own plugins.

Features.title: Support
Features.description: FusionCMS is backed by a team of developers. If you need help, you can reach out to us on Discord, or you can create a GitHub issue.

Features.title: Documentation
Features.description: FusionCMS has extensive documentation. You can find documentation for all of the features that FusionCMS has to offer.
